    • Field Detail

      • tc

        private TaxController tc
        Creating attributes for the class. The integer revenueTax is the tax which withdraws a percentage of the players account. The integer fixedTax is used to withdraw a predetermined amount of the players account.

      • revenueTax

        private double revenueTax

      • fixedTax

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tax

        public Tax(int fieldID,
           java.lang.String fieldName,
           java.lang.String fieldInfo,
           int fixedTax,
           double revenueTax)
        A constructor for the Tax field, used to create a Tax object
        Parameters:
        fieldID - is the ID/position of the field.
        fieldName - States the name of the field
        fieldInfo - Describes the field
        fixedTax - Determines the fixed tax
        revenueTax - Determines a percentage of the players account as tax

    • Method Detail

      • setrevenueTax

        public void setrevenueTax(int tax)
        Sets the revenue Tax
        Parameters:
        tax - determines 10 % of the players account as tax

      • getRevenueTax

        Gets and returns the revenue tax

      • getFixedTax

        public int getFixedTax()
        Gets and returns the fixed tax
        Returns:
